title: Strengthening Patient Care Practice Competencies: Customized Education Design Through Comparative Analysis of Programming Learning Pathways

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and experience in writing simple code
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning status in programming courses using three or more metrics (scores, engagement rates, code quality)
Learners can establish personalized learning strategies by analyzing differences in programming learning pathways based on academic backgrounds
Learners can track and improve developmental progress at each learning stage through process-oriented assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
